title: Sign-Language-Recognization
description: Worked with a team of four to design, train, and optimize a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) for real-time sign language image recognition using Python, TensorFlow, and OpenCV, achieving 86% accuracy.

title: Movie-Recommendation-System
description: Helps in recommending users movies when they searched for a movie. It recommends movies to user using few key elements like genres,keywords,cast and director.

title: Annadatha
description: Annadatha is an online selling platform which provides an easy portal between the Farmers and the Customers. It provides an easy interface for the farmers to add and sell the products and it is easy for the users to buy the products from the portal.
